name: Trapper! (Unity version)
description:
This is the Unity version of an old Flash game I made. I decided to remake this because I like the game, and I wanted to brush up on my Unity skills. Learned some new stuff in the process, such as coroutines. I made some slight additions to the help screen, but otherwise the game is mostly identical to the Flash version.

All code and game design is by me. Land, water, and trap sprite is by me. Music, player, and creature sprites are by Nintendo. Tree sprite is not by me, but I can't remember where I got it from.
